name: test_e2e_with_logs[189_XSS_REFL_004]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_REFL_004` |
| **Name** | Iframe javascript scheme XSS |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | reflected_xss |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `<iframe src=javascript:alert('XSS')>`
- **Encoded**: `%3Ciframe%20src%3Djavascript%3Aalert%28%27XSS%27%29%3E`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
